original_title: Blood, Sweat & Tears: Ramirez vs. Dogboe
overview: Fans will be treated to a feature both training camps ahead of the battle for the vacant WBO featherweight world championship between 29-year-old Cuban sensation Robeisy “El Tren” Ramírez (11-1, 7 KOs) and the 28-year-old Ghanaian former world champion Isaac “Royal Storm” Dogboe (24-2, 16 KOs).
title: Blood, Sweat & Tears: Ramirez vs. Dogboe
